SmokePing.description:
SmokePing is a network latency history monitor.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run SmokePing as.

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run SmokePing as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
